name: Something Approaches
description:
Something Approaches is a quick Twine game in which you attempt to defend yourself from a monster by barricading the room.  Gather materials and fortify the door over the course of seven days in an effort to survive.

Inspired by a current class on the history of Horror Games as a genre, I wanted to try to make one myself.  This is the result.

Approximately 2-4 Minute Playtime
